object.name: ItemAnnexContentSubcategory
object.property:
<model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema" i18n:domain="PloneMeeting"> <schema based-on="collective.iconifiedcategory.content.subcategory.ISubcategory">
<field name="other_mc_correspondences" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description i18n:translate="">other_mc_correspondences_descr</description> <required>False</required> <title i18n:translate="">PloneMeeting_label_otherMCCorrespondences</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.checkbox.CheckBoxWidget"></form:widget> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <vocabulary>Products.PloneMeeting.vocabularies.othermccorrespondencevocabulary</vocabulary> </value_type> </field>
<field name="only_for_meeting_managers" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description i18n:translate="">only_for_meeting_managers_descr</description> <default>False</default> <required>False</required> <title i18n:translate="">only_for_meeting_managers</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"></form:widget> </field>
</schema> </model>
